name: Bloodsteel Amalgam
description:
Slay hordes of enemy ships as you assimilate their broken remains into your own being. Bloodsteel Amalgam is a horizontal shoot'em up where you build your ship as you play, out of detached parts of enemy ships. Will you create a behemoth capable of withstanding any attack, or a swift vessel for dodging and scavenging? Or, can you even survive that long?

CONTROLS

WASD or Arrow Keys - move

Left Click - grab/release ship part

Enter - advance tutorial

Escape - quit

Bloodsteel Amalgam was a solo project made in 48 hours, for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam. The theme this time was joined together. All BGM and SFX used is licensed under Creative Commons 0.

BGM is from https://opengameart.org/

SFX is from https://freesound.org/
